content: WOW! That's a lot of weight to lose. Wrestlers used to use sauna suits, diuretics, and a whole lot of jogging in circles, including stadium stairs to cut that kind of weight in a hurry, but that can leave you very weak, and in a less than healthy condition. Cut way down on salt, as that makes you retain water, but drink lots of fruit juice. That will keep your hydration level up, while moving a whole lot out of your system. You're probably carrying 10-20 pounds of unneeded weight in you intestines and stomach right now that you could lose. The only way to burn off lots of fat is rigorous exercise of all the muscle groups. Alternating jogging and hitting the heavy bag (boxing) while wearing two layers of sweats is the best I've ever found besides wrestling one match after another of college style wrestling for several hours at a shot.... The big danger is heat prostration. If you push yourself too hard, your body's cooling system can go wacko and your temperature can go right through the roof, killing you of heat stroke. Do not work alone, and have plenty of cold water to drink and pour over yourself if you feel faint - - Good luck - - Wandering and Wondering
